description: Example for entity types as they will be exposed by ODM

packages.title: ODM Entities
packages.shortDescription: This package includes all aligned ODM Entities
packages.description: The ODM Entities are governed by the ODM Governance Board. They are semantically cross-LoB aligned and provide an unambiguous taxonomy

entityTypes.title: Business Partner
entityTypes.shortDescription: Person, an organization, or a group of persons or organizations.
entityTypes.description: A business partner is a person, an organization, or a group of persons or organizations in which a company has a business interest.
